alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 8:56PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Clarke Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 43.0 feet, Access to Eureka Landing community stops, with access cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 36.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 47.4 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
